articles.author: spacetimekd
articles.title: Show HN: Know what's happening in tech world at one place
articles.description: I have been a developer for a while and then took a short break. During my break, I wanted to keep track of what's happening in tech world. It was too much to surf around multiple sources.So, my friend and I created this app - where engineers can get everythi…
articles.content:
Tapa is the place for software engineers to share their experience of building products and learn from each other.
Engineering practices vary greatly from job to job and there are few resources for … [+663 chars]
